titleStmt.title: A memorial given in to the Senate of the city of Hamburgh in French faithfully translated into English.
titleStmt.author: Rycaut, Paul, Sir, 1628-1700.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: The Knight Rycaut resident for His Majesty the King of Great-Britan in the city of Hamburgh.
Concerns the Company of Scotland Trading to Africa and the Indies.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
